content: A unitholder in natural gas processor MarkWest Energy Partners LP   John Fox  came out in opposition to a proposed $15.6 billion takeover by Marathon Petroleum Corp   saying it would lead to a big cut in cash distributions to unitholders.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: MarkWest shareholder opposes acquisition by Marathon Petroleum

content: Nov 4 A shareholder of natural gas processor MarkWest Energy Partners LP  John Fox  said he was opposed to refiner Marathon Petroleum Corp's proposed $15.6 billion acquisition of the company through its pipeline unit  MPLX LP.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: MarkWest shareholder says he opposes MPLX deal

content: U.S. refiner Marathon Petroleum Corp  said it would cancel a planned expansion project at its 522 000-barrel-per-day Garyville  Louisiana refinery.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Petroleum scraps oil upgrader plans for Louisiana refinery

content: Oct 29 U.S. refiner Marathon Petroleum Corp  said it would cancel a planned expansion project at its 522 000-barrel-per-day Garyville  Louisiana refinery.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Marathon Petroleum scraps oil upgrader plans for Louisiana refinery

content: Oct 29 Refiner Marathon Petroleum Corp's  quarterly profit rose more than 40 percent  helped by strong demand for refined products and low crude costs.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Refiner Marathon Petroleum's profit jumps more than 40 pct

content: HOUSTON The 120 000 barrel-per-day (bpd) gasoline-producing fluidic catalytic cracking unit 3 at Marathon Petroleum Corp's 451 000-bpd Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas will be shut for three weeks of repairs  sources familiar with plant operations said on Wednesday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Galveston Bay large FCCU shut for three weeks: sources

content: * Aker Philadelphia Shipyard Inc entered into definitive agreements with a subsidiary of Marathon Petroleum Corporation for buy-out of APSI's interest in its joint venture with Crowley Maritime Corporation
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: BRIEF-Aker Philadelphia sells its interest in product tanker joint venture to Marathon Petroleum

content: HOUSTON  Aug 19 The biggest refiner in the U.S. Midwest is eyeing an unusual place to make more of a key ingredient for premium gasoline: the natural gas fields of eastern Ohio instead of an urban refinery.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon may step away from refineries to add alkylate capacity

content: NEW YORK Marathon Petroleum has begun restarting units at its 240 000 barrel-per-day refinery in Catlettsburg  Kentucky  six days after all units were shut down due to a power substation fire  according to a source familiar with the plant's operations.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon begins restart of Kentucky refinery: source

content: HOUSTON  Aug 5 MarkWest Energy Partners LP  and Marathon Petroleum Corp may build an alkylate facility in southeast Ohio  MarkWest Chief Executive Frank Semple told analysts on Wednesday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: MarkWest  Marathon Petroleum considering alkylate plant in Ohio

content: NEW YORK Marathon Petroleum is seeking alternative sources of power to restart units at its 212 000 barrel-per-day refinery in Catlettsburg  Kentucky after a substation was damaged on Sunday  according to a person familiar with the plant's operations.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon seeks alternative power at Kentucky refinery: source

content: HOUSTON  July 30 U.S. motorists are using more "premium" high-octane gasoline as low oil prices led to cheaper fill-ups at the pump. But even if prices rebound  octane demand will keep growing in the long term as fuel economy standards strengthen  Marathon Petroleum Corp Chief Executive Gary Heminger said on Thursday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: INTERVIEW-Marathon: Alkylation can satisfy higher octane demand

content: * Shares fall as much as 5 pct   (Adds details on crude prices  analyst comments; updates shares)
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Marathon Petroleum's margins hurt by high exposure to U.S. Midwest

content: July 30 Refiner Marathon Petroleum Corp  said it authorized an additional $2 billion share buyback  a day after it raised its quarterly dividend by 7 cents to 32 cents.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Petroleum plans additional $2 bln share buyback

content: HOUSTON  July 13 Marathon Petroleum Corp's  $15.6 billion deal to swallow MarkWest Energy Partners LP is the biggest bet yet by a refiner on fast-growing natural gas logistics and exports  analysts said on Monday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon's MarkWest acquisition eyes natural gas liquids exports

content: July 13 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2015 GMT on Monday:
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Marathon Petroleum Corp's  master limited partnership (MLP)  MPLX LP   will buy natural gas processor MarkWest Energy Partners LP  for about $15.63 billion  a deal that will create the fourth-largest MLP by market value.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: MPLX to buy MarkWest for $15.63 billion  creating fourth-largest MLP

content: * MPC shares up 7 pct  MPLX down 16 pct  MarkWest up 12 pct   (Adds background  analyst comment  share movement)
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Marathon Petroleum to buy gas processor MarkWest for $15.6 bln

content: July 13 Marathon Petroleum Corp's master limited partnership  MPLX LP  will acquire MarkWest Energy Partners LP for about $15.63 billion.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Petroleum's MLP to acquire MarkWest Energy for $15.63 bln

content: HOUSTON  July 7 Marathon Petroleum Corp  is contesting one citation and a $2 000 fine issued by the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration at the company's 451 000 barrel per day (bpd) Galveston Bay  Texas  refinery  according to documents released by the U.S. Department of Labor.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon challenges safety fine at Galveston Bay refinery

content: HOUSTON Striking workers from Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay Refinery ratified a new contract on Tuesday  ending a five-month strike  said local union officials.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Galveston Bay workers approve contract  end 5-month strike

content: HOUSTON Striking workers from Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay Refinery ratified a new contract on Tuesday  ending a five-month strike  said local union officials.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Galveston Bay workers OK contract  end five-month strike

content: HOUSTON More than 1 000 striking workers from Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay Refinery on Monday began two days of voting on a tentative contract  which if ratified  would end a five-month work stoppage  union officials said.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Texas refinery workers vote on contract that may end strike

content: NEW YORK Marathon's Petroleum Corp's 230 000 barrel-per-day crude oil pipeline that feeds its Catlettsburg  Kentucky refinery resumed operations on Tuesday afternoon after a brief outage due to routine maintenance that lasted a few hours  according to source familiar with the plant's operations.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon's crude oil pipeline in KY resumes operations: source

content: HOUSTON Negotiators for Marathon Petroleum Corp and union workers at the company’s Galveston Bay  Texas  refinery reached a tentative agreement on Monday for a four-year contract  pointing to the end of a walkout that has lasted four months  said local union officials.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Striking Texas refinery workers say reach tentative pact with Marathon

content: HOUSTON Marathon Petroleum Corp said on Tuesday it was disappointed by the rejection of a contract offer by striking workers at the company's Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City  Texas.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon disappointed Galveston Bay workers reject contract offer

content: HOUSTON  May 19 Marathon Petroleum Corp  said on Tuesday it was disappointed by the rejection of a contract offer by striking workers at the company's Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City  Texas.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Marathon disappointed Galveston Bay workers reject contract offer

content: TEXAS CITY  Texas  May 18 Hourly workers at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay  Texas  refinery voted on Monday to continue a strike  rejecting a contract proposal developed by a federal mediator aimed at ending a stoppage that has lasted three-and-a-half months.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Marathon Galveston Bay refinery workers vote to continue strike

content: LAMARQUE  Texas Acceptance of a new contract proposal to end a three-and-a-half- month strike by workers at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay  Texas  Refinery was uncertain on Sunday  one day ahead of a vote on the offered pact  workers said.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: End of Marathon Galveston Bay strike uncertain ahead of vote

content: HOUSTON Striking workers at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay  Texas  refinery are scheduled to vote on Monday on a new contract proposal hammered out by a federal mediator  company and union officials said on Thursday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Striking Marathon Galveston Bay refinery workers to vote on pact

content: HOUSTON  May 14 Striking workers at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay  Texas  refinery are scheduled to vote on Monday on a new contract proposal hammered out by a federal mediator  company and union officials said on Thursday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Striking Marathon Galveston Bay refinery workers to vote on pact

content: NEW YORK Kentucky Attorney General Jack Conway  a Democrat first elected in 2007  filed a lawsuit against Marathon Petroleum Corp in federal court on Tuesday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Kentucky Attorney General files suit against Marathon Petroleum

content: HOUSTON The two Capline owners with U.S. Midwest refining operations want to ensure they do not lose an important crude source as they and another partner evaluate reversing the oil pipeline  the nation's largest  executives with operator Marathon Petroleum Corp said in an interview on Thursday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Refiners want to maintain crude options if Capline reversed - executives

content: HOUSTON  April 30 Marathon Petroleum Corp.   the fourth-largest U.S. refiner  said on Thursday it would split its stock 2-for-1 in June as cheap domestic crude oils allow refiners to book healthy profits for fuels they make.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Petroleum says to split stock as refining profit surges

content: HOUSTON Marathon Petroleum Corp's "last  best and final offer" to settle an 11-week walkout by hourly workers at the Galveston Bay Refinery remains on the negotiating table despite being rejected by the United Steelworkers union (USW)  the company said on Wednesday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Final contract offer to end refinery walkout still on table: Marathon

content: LA MARQUE  Texas More than 800 striking workers at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay Refinery voted on Sunday to back their leaders' rejection of a last  best and final offer from the company to end a three-month work stoppage.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Galveston Bay workers back leadership's rebuff of offer

content: HOUSTON Marathon Petroleum Corp expects to start up a new 35 000-barrels-per-day (bpd) condensate splitter at its Kentucky refinery in May  Chief Executive Gary Heminger said on Tuesday on the sidelines of the IHS CERAweek energy conference in Houston.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Petroleum to start up Kentucky splitter in May: CEO

content: HOUSTON  April 21 Marathon Petroleum Corp  expects to start up a new 35 000-barrels-per-day (bpd) condensate splitter at its Kentucky refinery in May  Chief Executive Gary Heminger said on Tuesday on the sidelines of the IHS CERAweek energy conference in Houston.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: CERAWEEK-Marathon Petroleum to start up Kentucky splitter in May -CEO

content: HOUSTON  April 16 Striking workers at the Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay refinery in Texas City  Texas  rejected the company's "last  best and final" contract offer  according to a union official representing the workers.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Marathon refinery workers at Galveston Bay reject final offer -union

content: HOUSTON  April 16 Striking workers at the Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay refinery in Texas City  Texas  rejected the company's final contract offer  said an official of the United Steelworkers union local representing the workers.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon refinery workers at Galveston Bay reject final offer -union official

content: Hourly workers represented by the United Steelworkers union (USW) at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Catlettsburg  Kentucky  refinery voted on Friday to approve a new contract  ending a two-month work stoppage  a company spokesman said.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon Catlettsburg refinery workers OK new pact

content: HOUSTON A strike by the United Steelworkers (USW) local union at the   Marathon Petroleum Corp Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City  Texas  will continue as long as the company refuses to accept the terms of a newly-negotiated national agreement without encumberances  said a union official on Friday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Strike at Marathon's Galveston Bay plant to continue: USW official

content: HOUSTON  Feb 24 Marathon Petroleum Corp  is aiming to integrate its Texas refineries as part of a plan to increase diesel fuel output  Chief Executive Gary Heminger told analysts on Tuesday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Marathon petroleum aims to integrate two Texas refineries -CEO

content: HOUSTON  Feb 23 Talks to end the largest U.S. refinery strike in 35 years are not expected to resume this week  sources familiar with the negotiations said on Monday after the number of plants hit by walkouts increased over the weekend.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-No talks expected this week in U.S. refinery strike -sources

content: HOUSTON Talks to end the largest U.S. refinery strike in 35 years are not expected to resume this week  sources familiar with the negotiations said on Monday after the number of plants hit by walkouts increased over the weekend.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: No talks expected this week in U.S. refinery strike: sources

content: HOUSTON  Feb 21 The U.S. refinery strike widened on its 20th day  with workers at the nation's largest refinery walking off jobs and joining picket lines on Saturday as the United Steelworkers union (USW) pushes for a new contract that improves wages and safety.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. refinery strike widens to include nation's largest plant

content: HOUSTON  Feb 20 Lead U.S. oil company negotiator Shell Oil Co said face-to-face negotiations on Friday with the United Steelworkers union (USW) failed to yield an agreement to end the 20-day-old U.S. refinery strike.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Shell says no agreement in U.S. refinery strike talks

content: NEW YORK Tesoro Corp  and Marathon Petroleum Corp's  contingency plans to employ replacement workers at two of their refineries after union employees hit the picket lines are under scrutiny by inspectors in both Kentucky and California  officials of the two states said Wednesday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Two states looking at Tesoro's and Marathon's strike plans

content: HOUSTON  Feb 21 The U.S. refinery strike widened as workers at the nation's largest refinery walked off their jobs at 12 a.m. CST (0600 GMT) on Saturday  according to the United Steelworkers union (USW).
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: U.S. refinery strike widens to include nation's largest refinery

content: NEW YORK Workers represented by the Building Trades Unions will return to Marathon Petroleum Corp's  refinery in Catlettsburg  Kentucky on Monday  even as a strike by the United Steelworkers drags into a second week  documents obtained by Reuters show.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Building unions return to Kentucky refinery despite Steelworkers' Picketlines

content: NEW YORK  Feb 6 Workers represented by the Building Trades Unions will return to Marathon Petroleum Corp's  refinery in Catlettsburg  Kentucky on Monday  even as a strike by the United Steelworkers drags into a second week  documents obtained by Reuters show.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Building unions return to Kentucky refinery despite Steelworkers' Picketlines

content: NEW YORK Tesoro Corp  and Marathon Petroleum Corp's  contingency plans to employ replacement workers at two of their refineries after union employees hit the picket lines are under scrutiny by inspectors in both Kentucky and California  officials of the two states said Wednesday.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: Two states looking at Tesoro's and Marathon's strike plans

content: Feb 4 Marathon Petroleum Corp said it was deferring a final investment decision on its residual oil upgrader expansion (ROUX) project at its 522 000-barrel-per-day Garyville  Louisiana  refinery.
name: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Marathon defers decision on Garyville  La. refinery oil upgrader
